nodes.text: A Herglic bounty hunter was among a group of bounty hunters led by Bossk, Zuckuss, and 4-LOM that tried to steal the carbonite-frozen Han Solo from Boba Fett in 3.5 ABY. The Herglic, along with an unnamed four-armed hunter, and Zuckuss, boarded Fett's starship, Slave I. After tricking Furlag, who was charged with securing Fett within his own prisoner cells, Fett dropped down from a hatch and dispatched two of his assailants, blasting and killing both the Herglic and the alien.
